mapper.insert:
SELECT REVIEW_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REVIEW (GOODS_NUMBER, REVIEW_NUMBER, MEMBER_NUMBER, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_REGDATE, REVIEW_GRADE, REVIEW_TITLE) VALUES (#{GOODS_NUMBER}, #{REVIEW_NUMBER}, #{MEMBER_NUMBER}, #{REVIEW_CONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{REVIEW_GRADE}, #{REVIEW_TITLE})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_IMAGE=#{REVIEW_IMAGE} WHERE REVIEW_NUMBER=#{REVIEW_NUMBER}
mapper.select: SELECT D.MEMBER_NAME,A.REVIEW_TITLE, A.REVIEW_CONTENT, A.REVIEW_GRADE, A.REVIEW_IMAGE, A.REVIEW_REGDATE FROM REVIEW A, MEMBER D WHERE GOODS_NUMBER=#{GOODS_NUMBER} AND D.MEMBER_NUMBER=A.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY REVIEW_NUMBER DESC
SELECT AVG(REVIEW_GRADE)*20 FROM REVIEW WHERE GOODS_NUMBER=#{GOODS_NUMBER}

SELECT A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.REVIEW_NUMBER, A.MEMBER_NUMBER, A.REVIEW_CONTENT, A.REVIEW_IMAGE, A.REVIEW_TITLE,A.REVIEW_GRADE, A.REVIEW_REGDATE, C.GOODS_NAME, D.MEMBER_ID FROM REVIEW A, GOODS C, MEMBER D WHERE A.GOODS_NUMBER=C.GOODS_NUMBER AND A.MEMBER_NUMBER=D.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY REVIEW_NUMBER DESC

SELECT A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.REVIEW_NUMBER, A.MEMBER_NUMBER, A.REVIEW_CONTENT, A.REVIEW_IMAGE, A.REVIEW_TITLE,A.REVIEW_GRADE, A.REVIEW_REGDATE, C.GOODS_NAME, D.MEMBER_ID FROM REVIEW A, GOODS C, MEMBER D WHERE A.GOODS_NUMBER=C.GOODS_NUMBER AND A.MEMBER_NUMBER=D.MEMBER_NUMBER AND D.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{isSearch}||'%' ORDER BY REVIEW_NUMBER DESC
